samples.question: And should children be encouraged to use mobile phones from a young age and why?
samples.transcript: Not from young age. I think people, children especially, should go out more. But if someone watches over them, if their parent watches over them, And they limit the use of their phone. It can be good, but most of the time I do not think so. Since, you know, children will not go out, will not interact with people that much. They cannot be social. They will just look at these screens and it is not, it is, there is not much benefit in it. If you want to compare it with.
